languages.text: "Соболезную, дорогой мой. Надеюсь, вывезенных облигаций хватит, чтобы найти транспорт до Каликсиса..."

traits.locale_text: "Соболезную, дорогой мой. Надеюсь, вывезенных облигаций хватит, чтобы найти транспорт до Каликсиды..."

languages.text: "I offer you my sympathy, my dear sir. Oh, I do hope the bonds will be enough to purchase passage to Calixis..."
languages.original_text: "Соболезную, дорогой мой. Надеюсь, вывезенных облигаций хватит, чтобы найти транспорт до Каликсиса..."

traits.locale_text: "I offer you my condolences, my dear sir. Oh, I do hope the bonds will be enough to purchase passage to Calixis..."
"I offer you my condolences, my dear sir. Oh, I do hope the bonds will be enough to purchase passage to Calixis..."
"I offer you my condolences, my dear sir. Oh, I do hope the bonds will be enough to purchase passage to Calixis..."
"I offer you my condolences, my dear sir. Oh, I do hope the bonds will be enough to purchase passage to Calixis..."
"I offer you my sympathy, my dear sir. Oh, I do hope the bonds will be enough to purchase passage to Calixis..."
"I offer you my sympathy, my dear sir. Oh, I do hope the bonds will be enough to purchase passage to Calixis..."

languages.text: 「お悔やみ申し上げます。ああ、カリクシスへの旅券を買えるくらい保証金があればいいのですが…」
languages.original_text: "I offer you my sympathy, my dear sir. Oh, I do hope the bonds will be enough to purchase passage to Calixis..."

traits.locale_text: 「お悔やみ申し上げます。ああ、カリクシスへの旅券を買えるくらい保証金があればいいのですが…」

languages.text: « Je vous présente mes condoléances, mon bon monsieur. J'espère que les obligations suffiront à vous payer le transport jusqu'à Calixis... »
languages.original_text: "I offer you my sympathy, my dear sir. Oh, I do hope the bonds will be enough to purchase passage to Calixis..."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous présente mes condoléances, mon bon monsieur. J'espère que les obligations suffiront à vous payer le transport jusqu'à Calixis... »

languages.text: “我向您表示同情，亲爱的大人。噢，真希望这些债券足以支付前往卡利西斯的路费……”
languages.original_text: "I offer you my sympathy, my dear sir. Oh, I do hope the bonds will be enough to purchase passage to Calixis..."

traits.locale_text: “我向您表示遗憾，亲爱的大人。噢，真希望这些债券足以支付前往卡利西斯的路费……”

languages.text: "Meine Sympathie gehört Euch, werter Herr. Ich hoffe wirklich, dass die Pfandbriefe für den Kauf einer Passage nach Calixis ausreichen ..."
languages.original_text: "I offer you my sympathy, my dear sir. Oh, I do hope the bonds will be enough to purchase passage to Calixis..."

traits.locale_text: "Euch gilt mein aufrichtiges Mitleid, werter Herr. Ich hoffe wirklich, dass die Pfandbriefe für den Kauf einer Passage nach Calixis ausreichen ..."

languages.text: «Lo lamento, señor mío. Espero que me lleguen los bonos para comprar un billete a Calixis...».
languages.original_text: "I offer you my sympathy, my dear sir. Oh, I do hope the bonds will be enough to purchase passage to Calixis..."

traits.locale_text: «Lo siento mucho, señor mío. Espero que me lleguen los bonos para comprar un billete a Calixis...».

languages.text: "Sizi çok iyi anlıyorum efendim. Vereceğiniz senetler umarım Calixis'e gidebilmenize yeter."
languages.original_text: "I offer you my sympathy, my dear sir. Oh, I do hope the bonds will be enough to purchase passage to Calixis..."

traits.locale_text: "Sizi çok iyi anlıyorum efendim. Ah, umarım sahip olduğunuz bağlantılar Calixis'e geçebilmenizi sağlar."
